update.description: 2015-03-12 Update: 1. NEW FEATURE: Lock / unlock current window (Ctrl + Shift + Home) 2. Added Chinese translation to some UI labels 3. Changed some hotkeys for easy usage 4. Reworked the logic of jumping from bookmark view to previous location 5. Fixed some bugs from the "toggle current line / original title" function 6. Fixed a bug that prevents saving the original title 7. Rewrote the function of measuring the width of title bar area for text display
